title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture. Serve warm.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken chunks cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Mix grilled chicken into sauce and simmer.
